feed.title: Andres Mendez-Vazquez, A Personal Exploration about Intelligent Systems
feed.subtitle: A personal exploration about Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Computational Mathematics

entry.title: Intelligent System Ideas
entry.content:
“Long ago evolution gave us the enchanted loom, now we are looking for a companion beyond de lonely universe”

My intention with this page is to post my thoughts, classes, notes and projects about these ideas:

- Machine Learning
- Deep Learning
- Artificial Intelligence
- Computational Mathematics

Because at the end the search for Artificial Intelligence is to use applied mathematics to understand the universe.
entry.summary: “Long ago evolution gave us the enchanted loom, now we are looking for a companion beyond de lonely universe”
